>

</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 588 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 18,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [high-grade silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=316) [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1) (Hardness 6, HP 24, BT 12) is polished to a mirrorlike sheen. The shield functions as a [_spellguard shield_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=325) that can also reflect spells.

<document level="2" id="action-195" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of _spell turning_, and the initial raw materials must include at least 2,750 gp of silver.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
